LGBT activists are claiming space in the “gayborhood” and are protesting the new 76ers stadium.

"THIS IS OUR QUEER SAFE SPACE"

title: Watch: Draq queens demand swing state NBA team stay out of their, quote, “gayborhood”

There is nothing more cringe-worthy than an out-of-touch woman trying desperately to be accepted by the younger generation, especially when done in the most stereotypical worldview that ends up looking like she’s mocking them.

Rosa DeLauro is a member of Congress and has just proved that America has a mental health crisis, as there’s no logical reason a sane person would elect her.

Ever see that episode of South Park where there was an anti-smoking assembly, but the speakers were so gay, it
title: Watch: Purple-haired Dem congresswoman pandering to Gen Z will make you cringe out of your skin
